transcript:
[AUTOMATED NOTICE] This communication is recorded. Facility: North River Correctional Center.
Inmate (Casey Garcia): I heard Unit B is short staffed again. Things feel tense.
Outside Contact: Keep your head down. Any issues with safety?
Inmate (Casey Garcia): There was talk of a fight after chow.

[AUTOMATED NOTICE] This communication is recorded. Facility: North River Correctional Center.
Inmate (Casey Garcia): People keep saying 'paper' like it's normal. I'm not trying to get wrapped up in contraband or drug use.
Outside Contact: Stay clear. Are they pressuring you?
Inmate (Casey Garcia): Yeah, debts. They said pills are moving around but I'm not involved.

[AUTOMATED NOTICE] This communication is recorded. Facility: North River Correctional Center.
Inmate (Casey Garcia): I'm uncomfortable with how someone is trying to pressure people. It feels coercive.
Outside Contact: Are you safe?
Inmate (Casey Garcia): I'm trying to avoid it.

[AUTOMATED NOTICE] This communication is recorded. Facility: North River Correctional Center.
Inmate (Riley Miller): I can't sleep. My chest is tight and I keep panicking.
Outside Contact: Tell medical. You don't have to handle that alone.
Inmate (Riley Miller): I'll try. I just feel hopeless lately.

[AUTOMATED NOTICE] This communication is recorded. Facility: North River Correctional Center.
Inmate (Morgan Davis): Don't use real names. I keep hearing about 'accounts' and 'drops'.
Outside Contact: That sounds risky. Don't say more on the phone.
Inmate (Morgan Davis): I'm not doing it, just hearing chatter.
